name: back-node
description: Tareas:     - Listado: GET /tasks     - Obtener una tarea: GET /tasks/{id}     - Crear: POST /tasks     - Editar: PUT /tasks/{id}     - Eliminar: DELETE /tasks/{id}     - Marcar completado: PUT /tasks/{id}?state=completed     - Marcar pendiente: PUT /tasks/{id}?state=pending
